attributes.action: disallow all MP's a pay rise while the economy is in dire straits
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: On the basis that the Chancellor wishes all sectors of business to stop joe public having a pay rise any time soon (to help stop inflation), it seems only right that MP's should shoulder the same burden and not have any pay rises or increases in allowances.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
